docTitle.titlePart:
Synthesis and Structure of the Novel Pentaselenidohexaarsenate(I,II) Cluster
Anion [As 6 Se 5 ] 2

byline.docAuthor: Anna Kromm and William S. Sheldrick*

byline.affiliation: Lehrstuhl für Analytische Chemie der Ruhr-Universität Bochum

front.div:
Abstract. Methanolothermal reaction of [MnCl 3 (9-ane-N 3 )] with
As 2 Se 3 at 150 �C in the presence of Cs 2 CO 3 affords violet-coloured
[Mn(9-ane-N 3 ) 2 ]As 6 Se 5 (1). Its novel tricyclic selenidoarsenate(I,II)
anion [As 6 Se 5 ] 2<U+6E129> contains two five-membered [As 3 As(Se)Se] rings
that are symmetry-related by a crystallographic C 2 axis passing
through the common As I -As I bond between their respective first
two ring members. The adjacent As I atoms in the individual rings
are bridged by the Se atom of the third [As 4 Se] ring.
front.keywords:
Keywords: Selenidoarsenate; Manganese; Cluster anion; Solvother-
mal synthesis; Crystal structure
